name: Final Guardian
description:
Wake up guardian!

Player character’s name Leona was a proud member of the centaur race, tasked by the gods to protect the remnant crystals, crystals which contained the power of Abethlor and other powerful beings, locking them away. These crystals were spread across the Æsteria sky islands, each defended by one of the 4 tribes. Leona was a member of the Abelthor tribe, the one which was the weakest of the four. She/ he was born centuries ago but was frozen by a mysterious spell 250 years ago and has since never woken up until today.

Abelthor used to be a centaur, a member of the Abelthor tribe until the Conflict 250 years ago. Became a spirit inhibiting a set of ancient armor after he broke through the first crystal, has been steadily becoming more real with each destroyed crystal. The main antagonist of the story.

Finish your last responsibility

The player's aim is to protect a crystal at the center of the map from not being destroyed by monsters coming from the two sides of the map. The number of monsters coming from the two sides of the map is endless, and the difficulty of the game increases as time passes on, thus making it an endless survival game. But what is different about our game from other and the survival games, is our tower and building mechanic.

Build your towers

During the surviving period, players can use the resources they have gathered to build walls and towers, helping them fend off the endless waves of monsters. The players can place these towers at any point on the map, making it a very creative game, as players can decide where and when to place the towers to offer maximum strategic support. 

Controls

Movement:

  • A (Move left)
  • S (Move down)
  • D (Move right)
  • Space (Jump)

In-Game Mechanics:

  • E  (Switch between combat mode and building mode)
  • Q (Switch material in building mode)
  • Num 1 to Num 5 (Switch weapons in combat mode, switch building in build mode)
  • Left -click (Attack in combat mode, build in build mode)
  • Right-click (Upgrade towers in building mode)
System Requirements

Windows

  • Windows XP Service Pack 2 or higher (DirectX 9.0c or higher must be installed).
  • DirectX 9 or higher GPU
  • 1024x768 screen resolution
  • 2.0 GHz Dual Core Pentium, i3, or higher processor
  • 2 GB available hard drive space
  • 4 GB RAM

Minimum Graphics Card (for Fast Quality)

  • Intel 4000 integrated graphics or higher
  • NVIDIA 6800 Ultra
  • ATI HD 3670

Recommended Graphics Card (for Good Quality or Higher)

  • NVIDIA GeForce 640 series or later
  • AMD Radeon HD 6670

Mac OSX

  • OSX 10.9 or higher
  • 64-bit processor (i5 or higher)
  • 1024 x 768 or higher screen resolution
  • 2 GB available hard drive space
  • 4 GB RAM

Minimum Graphics Card (for Fast Quality)

  • Intel 4000 integrated graphics or higher

Recommended Graphics Card (for Good Quality or Higher)

  • NVIDIA GeForce 640 series or later
  • AMD Radeon HD 6670
